leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-DFT 生态（输入/求解/后处理）
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 结构生成→DFT→后处理→高通量→验证

unit.unit_name: 高通量工作流与任务调度

queries: [WEB] python framework for materials simulations github
[WEB] vasp quantum espresso job management github

tools.name: asimtools
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management and script handling for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to optimize workflow management and script handling specifically for atomistic simulations, facilitating high-throughput computational materials science tasks.

tools.name: aiida-gromacs
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for GROMACS molecular dynamics software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that enables the automation and provenance tracking of GROMACS molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: WFacer
tools.one_line_profile: Automated cluster expansion workflows using atomate2 and Jobflow
tools.detailed_description: A tool for modulated automation of cluster expansion calculations in materials science, built upon the atomate2 and Jobflow frameworks.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-espresso
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen addon for parsing Quantum ESPRESSO files
tools.detailed_description: An extension for pymatgen that provides input/output handling and parsing capabilities specifically for Quantum ESPRESSO electronic structure codes.

tools.name: strucscan
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for high-throughput material simulation
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python-based framework designed to facilitate high-throughput material simulations and structure scanning.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with the FLEUR code, enabling high-throughput all-electron density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for JuKKR KKR code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with the JuKKR code (Korringa-Kohn-Rostoker Green function method) for electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: Atomate2 workflows for LAMMPS molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for the atomate2 workflow framework that implements workflows specifically for the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code.

tools.name: jobflow-remote
tools.one_line_profile: Remote execution extension for the Jobflow workflow library
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the execution of Jobflow workflows on remote computing resources, extending the capabilities of the Jobflow framework commonly used in materials science.

tools.name: Express.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible workflow framework for ab initio materials calculations
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Julia framework designed to accelerate and automate ab initio calculations for the materials science community, providing an extensible workflow structure.

tools.name: pw-sgwpy
tools.one_line_profile: Scripts for Quantum Espresso/SGW parsing and plotting
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts for parsing outputs, managing workflows, and plotting results from Quantum Espresso and SGW calculations.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for materials and chemistry deep learning
tools.detailed_description: Provides Keras layers and utilities for building end-to-end deep learning models for molecules and crystals, integrating with RDKit and Pymatgen.

tools.name: ScalableWorkflow_VASP_Calculations
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for generating VASP input cases for alloys
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow designed to generate VASP input files with randomized atomic structures for solid solution binary and ternary alloys across the compositional range.

tools.name: dfttk (Archived 20210211)
tools.one_line_profile: Thermodynamics workflows based on Atomate (Archived)
tools.detailed_description: An archived version of DFTTK, providing density functional theory workflows for calculating finite temperature thermodynamics, built upon the Atomate framework.

tools.name: dfttk
tools.one_line_profile: Automated VASP workflows for thermodynamics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for automating VASP workflows, specifically focused on finite temperature thermodynamics, and managing results storage in MongoDB.

tools.name: dfttk-2021
tools.one_line_profile: DFT workflows for thermodynamics (2021 version)
tools.detailed_description: A version of the DFTTK package providing workflows for finite temperature thermodynamics calculations using VASP and Atomate.

tools.name: quacc
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible platform for high-throughput computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A platform for computational materials science and quantum chemistry built for the big data era, designed to be flexible and scalable for high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: ShakeNBreak
tools.one_line_profile: Defect structure-searching with bond distortions
tools.detailed_description: A tool for defect structure-searching in materials that employs chemically-guided bond distortions to identify ground-state defect configurations.

tools.name: doped
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for defect supercell calculations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for the generation, pre-processing, post-processing, and analysis of defect supercell calculations, streamlining the defect simulation workflow.

tools.name: surfaxe
tools.one_line_profile: Surface slab generation and analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating and analyzing slab structures for first-principles calculations of surfaces, facilitating surface science studies.

tools.name: VASP-DOS_extractor
tools.one_line_profile: Extracts DOS data from VASP outputs
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based Python script designed to extract density of states (DOS) and projected DOS data from VASP `vasprun.xml` files.

tools.name: VASP-Structural_Descriptors
tools.one_line_profile: Collects structural descriptors from atomic structures
tools.detailed_description: A Pymatgen-based script for collecting and calculating structural descriptors from large sets of atomic structures, useful for materials analysis.

tools.name: aiida-champ
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CHAMP QMC code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to manage and execute workflows using the CHAMP Quantum Monte Carlo code.

tools.name: aiida-qp2
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum Package 2.0
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin designed to interface with Quantum Package 2.0, enabling automated workflows for quantum chemistry calculations.

tools.name: dft_tools
tools.one_line_profile: Interface to DFT codes for TRIQS
tools.detailed_description: A TRIQS application that provides an interface to various DFT codes, facilitating many-body physics calculations and DMFT workflows.

tools.name: PyVUMAT
tools.one_line_profile: Python framework for custom FEA material models
tools.detailed_description: A framework enabling the development of custom material models (VUMATs) in Python for integration into finite element analysis (FEA) simulations.

tools.name: mcp-atomictoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: MCP server for atomistic simulations via LLMs
tools.detailed_description: An MCP (Model Context Protocol) compatible server that exposes atomistic simulation capabilities (via ASE, Pymatgen) to Large Language Models.

tools.name: CPTI
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow for constant potential thermodynamic integration in VASP
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed to perform constant potential thermodynamic integration calculations using the VASP DFT code.

tools.name: NepTrain
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for training neuroevolution potentials (NEP)
tools.detailed_description: An automated toolkit for training neuroevolution potentials (NEP), integrating GPUMD and VASP for streamlined workflows including active learning and potential training.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian-based VASP plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin for VASP that leverages Custodian for robust error handling and recovery during high-throughput calculations.

tools.name: aiida-phonopy
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon calculations plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that interfaces with Phonopy to automate phonon calculations and analysis within the AiiDA workflow framework.

tools.name: aiida-trains-pot
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA workflow implementing a fully automated active learning scheme to train neural network interatomic potentials.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Official VASP plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: The official plugin to interface VASP with the AiiDA workflow engine, enabling high-throughput DFT calculations and data provenance tracking.

tools.name: AiiDAlab
tools.one_line_profile: Web platform for computational science workflows and applications
tools.detailed_description: Implements the core functions and environment for AiiDAlab, a web-based platform that allows researchers to access and run computational science workflows and applications through a user-friendly interface.

tools.name: AiiDAlab QE
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab application for Quantum ESPRESSO calculations
tools.detailed_description: A graphical application within the AiiDAlab platform that facilitates running Quantum ESPRESSO calculations, managing inputs, and visualizing results without direct command-line interaction.

tools.name: aiida-ase
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that interfaces the AiiDA workflow engine with the ASE (Atomic Simulation Environment) library, allowing ASE calculators and structures to be used within AiiDA's provenance-tracking workflows.

tools.name: aiida-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for LAMMPS molecular dynamics code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling the execution and management of LAMMPS molecular dynamics simulations within the AiiDA framework, supporting various potentials and calculation types.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Standardized workflow interfaces for materials science codes
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing common interfaces for workflows across different quantum mechanical codes (like QE, VASP, CP2K) in AiiDA, facilitating cross-code verification and interoperability.

tools.name: AiiDA Core
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow engine with provenance tracking
tools.detailed_description: The core engine of AiiDA (Automated Interactive Infrastructure and Database for Computational Science), providing workflow management, data provenance tracking, and high-throughput task scheduling for materials science.

tools.name: aiida-cp2k
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CP2K quantum chemistry code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that integrates the CP2K software package into the AiiDA framework, enabling automated and reproducible electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida-hubbard
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for calculating Hubbard parameters
tools.detailed_description: A set of AiiDA workflows for the self-consistent calculation of onsite and intersite Hubbard U and V parameters using linear response theory (DFPT).

tools.name: aiida-hyperqueue
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA scheduler plugin for HyperQueue
tools.detailed_description: A plugin enabling AiiDA to submit and manage jobs using the HyperQueue metascheduler, optimizing task scheduling on HPC clusters.

tools.name: aiida-quantumespresso
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Quantum ESPRESSO
tools.detailed_description: The official plugin connecting Quantum ESPRESSO with AiiDA, providing advanced workflows for band structure, DOS, and relaxation calculations with full provenance.

tools.name: aiida-submission-controller
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for managing high-throughput job submissions
tools.detailed_description: A utility library for AiiDA to manage large batches of job submissions, controlling the number of active runs to prevent overloading schedulers.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Wannier90
tools.detailed_description: A plugin integrating the Wannier90 code into AiiDA, allowing for the calculation of Maximally Localized Wannier Functions (MLWFs) within automated workflows.

tools.name: aiida-wannier90-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflows for Wannier90 calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of robust, automated workflows for computing Wannier functions using AiiDA and Wannier90, handling preprocessing and postprocessing steps.

tools.name: aiida-workgraph
tools.one_line_profile: GUI-based workflow designer for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A tool to design and manage flexible AiiDA workflows using a graph-based approach, featuring an interactive GUI and support for checkpoints and remote execution.

tools.name: plumpy
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow library for stateful processes
tools.detailed_description: The underlying workflow library used by AiiDA to define and execute stateful processes with defined inputs and outputs, serving as the building block for scientific workflows.

tools.name: twod_materials
tools.one_line_profile: High throughput workflows for 2D materials
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and workflows for the high-throughput characterization of two-dimensional materials using VASP, including stability and property analysis.

tools.name: aiida-vibroscopy
tools.one_line_profile: Workflows for vibrational spectroscopy
tools.detailed_description: A package for automated calculation of infrared and Raman spectra and phonon properties using AiiDA, supporting multiple DFT codes.

tools.name: beautiful-atoms
tools.one_line_profile: High-quality atom and molecule rendering
tools.detailed_description: A Python module that leverages Blender to create high-quality, publication-ready 3D renderings of atoms, molecules, and crystal structures.

tools.name: SgsAnnDataV2
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for single-cell analysis objects
tools.detailed_description: A package designed to convert various single-cell analysis objects (Seurat, Giotto, Signac, ArchR) into the AnnData format, facilitating interoperability in bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: signac
tools.one_line_profile: Analytics package for single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: An analytics package for processing and analyzing single-cell data, likely focusing on chromatin accessibility or multi-omics integration (based on the standard Signac tool profile, though this repo is C++ implementation).

tools.name: Atomistic Nodal Approach Nanoparticles
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing for interfacial thermal conductance
tools.detailed_description: Python codes and workflows for processing LAMMPS data to calculate interfacial heat flux, temperature discontinuity, and interfacial thermal conductance using the atomistic nodal approach.

tools.name: Atomistic.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Julia workflow for molecular dynamics simulations
tools.detailed_description: A package that provides an integrated workflow for molecular dynamics simulations within the Julia ecosystem, facilitating atomistic modeling tasks.

tools.name: ai2-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for AI-enhanced ab initio computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit featuring artificial intelligence integrated with ab initio methods for computational chemistry research, enabling automated workflows.

tools.name: ase-notebook
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D/3D visualizations for ASE/Pymatgen structures in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: Highly configurable SVG and Three.js visualizations for atomic structures compatible with ASE and Pymatgen, designed for use within Jupyter Notebooks.

tools.name: planckton
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular dynamics workflow for organic photovoltaic morphology
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the reproducible exploration of organic photovoltaic morphology self-assembly using molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and MD
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed to generate many-body potential energy representations and perform molecular dynamics simulations with ab initio accuracy.

tools.name: dftd4
tools.one_line_profile: Atomic-Charge Dependent London Dispersion Correction
tools.detailed_description: A generally applicable atomic-charge dependent London dispersion correction library and tool for density functional theory calculations.

tools.name: Auto-QChem
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for DFT calculations of organic molecules
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool for the generation, execution, and storage of DFT calculations specifically designed for organic molecules.

tools.name: aiida-defects
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for defect calculations workflows
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA platform that provides automated workflows for calculating properties of defects in materials.

tools.name: bandstructureplots
tools.one_line_profile: Band structure plotting tool using pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating band structure plots using pymatgen, featuring RGB scales to visualize atomic or orbital contributions.

tools.name: PhononFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow scripts and tools for phonon calculations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools designed to facilitate and automate the workflow for phonon calculations using VASP and phonopy.

tools.name: vaspMD
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow tools for ab initio Molecular Dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A suite of scripts and tools to support workflows for ab initio Molecular Dynamics (AIMD) and Machine Learning Force Field MD calculations using VASP.

tools.name: signac
tools.one_line_profile: Data management framework for computational science
tools.detailed_description: A framework to manage large and heterogeneous data spaces on the file system, specifically designed to streamline simulation and data analysis workflows in computational science.

tools.name: signac-dashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Dashboard for visualizing signac data spaces
tools.detailed_description: A web-based dashboard interface for rapidly visualizing and exploring data managed by the signac framework.

tools.name: signac-flow
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management and job submission for signac data spaces
tools.detailed_description: A workflow management tool that integrates with the signac framework to manage data spaces and automate job submission to high-performance computing clusters.

tools.name: atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built workflows for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: A collection of pre-defined workflows for computational materials science, designed to run on top of the FireWorks workflow software and Pymatgen.

tools.name: maptools
tools.one_line_profile: Materials simulation data processing toolkit based on Pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A program for processing materials simulation data, built upon the Pymatgen library, facilitating structure manipulation and analysis.

tools.name: httk
tools.one_line_profile: High-Throughput Toolkit for materials calculations
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for preparing and running calculations, analyzing results, and storing outcomes in global or personalized databases for materials science.

tools.name: ASE_ANI
tools.one_line_profile: ANI-1 neural network potential interface for ASE
tools.detailed_description: Provides an interface for using the ANI-1 neural network potential within the Atomic Simulation Environment (ASE) for molecular dynamics and optimization.

tools.name: aiidalab-ispg
tools.one_line_profile: Ab initio UV/vis spectroscopy workflows for AiiDA Lab
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA Lab application for computing UV/vis spectroscopy properties using ab initio methods, specifically the ATMOSPEC workflow.

tools.name: jkitchin-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: Enhanced ASE interface for VASP
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper and interface for the VASP DFT code, compliant with ASE, providing enhanced functionality for input generation and output parsing.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments workflows
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for automated conformer generation, QM input creation, and post-processing, integrating RDKit, CREST, and xTB.

tools.name: structuregraph-helpers
tools.one_line_profile: Helpers for Pymatgen structure graphs
tools.detailed_description: A library of helper functions for working with structure graphs in Pymatgen, facilitating topological analysis of materials.

tools.name: perovskites-distortions
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis tools for perovskite structure distortions
tools.detailed_description: A collection of functions to manipulate and analyze the structural distortions of hybrid organic-inorganic perovskites.

tools.name: matscipy
tools.one_line_profile: Materials science tools for atomic-scale processing
tools.detailed_description: A library for materials science at the atomic scale, providing efficient tools for structure manipulation, neighbor lists, and analysis, often used with ASE.

tools.name: aiida-lsmo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA workflows for LSMO laboratory
tools.detailed_description: A collection of AiiDA workflows and calculations developed for the LSMO laboratory at EPFL, focusing on materials simulations.

tools.name: aiida-raspa
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for RASPA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with the RASPA software for simulating adsorption and diffusion in porous materials.

tools.name: aiida-zeopp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Zeo++
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine to interface with Zeo++, a software for performing geometry analysis of porous materials.

tools.name: aiida-graph-render
tools.one_line_profile: Visualization tool for AiiDA provenance graphs
tools.detailed_description: A tool to render complex AiiDA provenance graphs using GePhi, aiding in the visualization and understanding of scientific workflows.

tools.name: AiiDA Explorer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive provenance browser for AiiDA databases
tools.detailed_description: A web-based application to explore and visualize the provenance graph of scientific calculations stored in AiiDA databases, allowing users to inspect inputs, outputs, and workflow steps.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow definitions for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: A collection of specific workflow implementations that integrate pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks to power the high-throughput calculations of the Materials Project.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Library of computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A modern library of computational materials science workflows, serving as a successor to atomate, designed to run complex simulations using Jobflow and FireWorks.

tools.name: Custodian
tools.one_line_profile: Just-in-time job management and error correction framework
tools.detailed_description: A robust job management framework that wraps scientific codes (like VASP) to perform error recovery, checkpointing, and job monitoring in high-throughput computing environments.

tools.name: FireWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow management system for high-throughput computing
tools.detailed_description: A workflow software for running high-throughput calculation workflows at supercomputing centers, featuring dynamic workflow modification and database-backed job management.

tools.name: Jobflow
tools.one_line_profile: Library for writing computational workflows
tools.detailed_description: A library designed to write computational workflows that are engine-agnostic, allowing complex scientific pipelines to be defined and executed on various backend runners like FireWorks.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools built on pymatgen and atomate to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, specifically for VASP simulations.

tools.name: pymatgen
tools.one_line_profile: Robust materials analysis and structure manipulation library
tools.detailed_description: Python Materials Genomics (pymatgen) is a core library for materials analysis, defining classes for structures and molecules, and providing IO support for many electronic structure codes like VASP.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-alloys
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen add-on for alloy system analysis
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for pymatgen containing specialized classes and functions for describing alloy systems and analyzing relevant materials data.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-defects
tools.one_line_profile: Defect analysis modules for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: A specialized module for analyzing point defects in materials, including formation energy calculations and thermodynamic analysis, integrated with the pymatgen ecosystem.

tools.name: pymatgen-db
tools.one_line_profile: Database management tool for materials data
tools.detailed_description: An addon to pymatgen that facilitates the creation and management of Materials Project-style MongoDB databases for storing and querying materials calculation data.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-validation
tools.one_line_profile: Input/output validator for DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive validator to ensure VASP calculation inputs and outputs are compatible with Materials Project standards and data integrity requirements.

tools.name: pymatgen-analysis-diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Diffusion analysis tools for pymatgen
tools.detailed_description: An add-on to pymatgen providing tools for analyzing diffusion in materials, including Nudged Elastic Band (NEB) analysis and molecular dynamics diffusion coefficients.

tools.name: aiida-autocas
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for automated active space selection
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin designed to automatically select active spaces for multireference quantum chemistry calculations, facilitating complex electronic structure workflows.

tools.name: aiida-dynamic-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Dynamic workflow definition for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: An AiiDA plugin that enables the definition of dynamic workflows using Python functions, allowing for more flexible and adaptive scientific calculation pipelines.

tools.name: aiida-pyscf
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for PySCF
tools.detailed_description: An interface connecting the AiiDA workflow engine with the PySCF quantum chemistry simulation framework, enabling automated and reproducible chemistry simulations.

tools.name: abcv
tools.one_line_profile: Python-based crystal structure viewer
tools.detailed_description: A visualization tool for crystal structures built upon fresnel and pymatgen, designed to create high-quality renderings of materials.

tools.name: aiida-gaussian
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Gaussian quantum chemistry software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin integrating the Gaussian quantum chemistry software into the AiiDA workflow framework, enabling automated molecular calculations.

tools.name: aiidalab-empa-surfaces
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDAlab app for on-surface chemistry
tools.detailed_description: An application running within the AiiDAlab platform specifically designed for simulating and analyzing on-surface chemistry and scanning probe microscopy.

tools.name: pymatgen-io-openmm
tools.one_line_profile: Pymatgen IO module for OpenMM simulations
tools.detailed_description: A module that facilitates setting up and running OpenMM molecular dynamics simulations using pymatgen's data structures and IO capabilities.

tools.name: widget-bandsplot
tools.one_line_profile: Jupyter widget for bandstructure plotting
tools.detailed_description: An interactive Jupyter widget designed to plot and explore electronic band structures and density of states (DOS) for materials science education and research.

tools.name: DFTtoolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for building inputs and analyzing results of DFT codes
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox designed to facilitate the preparation of input files and the analysis of output results for Density Functional Theory (DFT) codes, streamlining the simulation workflow.

tools.name: pyiron/atomistics
tools.one_line_profile: Interfaces for atomistic simulation codes and workflows
tools.detailed_description: Provides interfaces and abstractions for various atomistic simulation codes, enabling their integration into workflows and the pyiron ecosystem.

tools.name: pyiron/executorlib
tools.one_line_profile: HPC job execution library for python functions
tools.detailed_description: A library to upscale Python functions for High-Performance Computing (HPC) environments, managing job submission and execution scaling.

tools.name: pyiron/ironflow
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical user interface for pyiron workflows
tools.detailed_description: A web-based graphical user interface (GUI) for the pyiron IDE, allowing users to design, visualize, and manage scientific workflows interactively.

tools.name: pyiron
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated Development Environment (IDE) for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: An integrated development environment (IDE) that provides a comprehensive framework for complex workflow management, data storage, and job execution in computational materials science.

tools.name: pyiron_atomistics
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic simulation module for pyiron IDE
tools.detailed_description: The specialized module within the pyiron ecosystem focused on atomistic simulations, providing tools for structure manipulation, potential management, and simulation setup.

tools.name: pyiron_base
tools.one_line_profile: Core components of the pyiron IDE
tools.detailed_description: The foundational library for pyiron, providing the core infrastructure for job management, database interaction, and workflow orchestration independent of specific scientific domains.

tools.name: pyiron_contrib
tools.one_line_profile: Community extensions for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A collection of user-contributed modules and extensions that expand the functionality of the pyiron ecosystem, covering experimental or specialized scientific tasks.

tools.name: pyiron_ontology
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology-guided workflow design for pyiron
tools.detailed_description: Integrates ontologies with pyiron workflows to enable semantic interoperability and guided workflow construction using owlready2.

tools.name: pyiron_potentialfit
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning potential fitting with pyiron
tools.detailed_description: A module within the pyiron ecosystem dedicated to fitting interatomic potentials, particularly machine learning potentials, from reference data.

tools.name: pyiron_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Graph-and-node based workflow engine
tools.detailed_description: A flexible, graph-based workflow engine for pyiron that allows users to define complex scientific workflows using a node-based architecture.

tools.name: structuretoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Atomistic structure analysis and visualization toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for building, analyzing, and visualizing atomistic structures, serving as a utility library for materials science workflows.

tools.name: python-workflow-definition
tools.one_line_profile: Interoperable workflow definitions for materials science
tools.detailed_description: Defines a standard for Python-based workflows to enable interoperability between major materials science workflow engines like AiiDA, Jobflow, and Pyiron.

tools.name: pysktb
tools.one_line_profile: Slater Koster tight-binding hamiltonian solver
tools.detailed_description: A scientific Python package for solving Slater-Koster tight-binding topological Hamiltonians, useful for electronic structure calculations.

tools.name: aiida-siesta
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the SIESTA DFT code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that enables the execution and management of simulations using the SIESTA Density Functional Theory code.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for AiiDA that facilitates the use of machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) within automated workflows.

tools.name: Signac
tools.one_line_profile: R toolkit for single-cell chromatin data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive R toolkit designed for the analysis of single-cell chromatin accessibility data, including peak calling, quantification, and visualization.

tools.name: ArchRtoSignac
tools.one_line_profile: Conversion tool from ArchR to Signac objects
tools.detailed_description: An R package that facilitates the conversion of ArchRProject objects (from ArchR) to SeuratObject objects (for Signac), enabling interoperability between single-cell analysis tools.

tools.name: MAST
tools.one_line_profile: Materials Simulation Toolkit for automated high-throughput DFT workflows
tools.detailed_description: A workflow manager designed to automate electronic structure calculations (specifically with pymatgen) for high-throughput materials screening and analysis.

tools.name: aiida-yambo
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for Yambo many-body perturbation theory code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that facilitates the automation and provenance tracking of calculations using the Yambo code for excited-state properties.

tools.name: XenonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for materials informatics and transfer learning
tools.detailed_description: A materials informatics platform offering tools for descriptor generation (compositional/structural), transfer learning models, and visualization for materials property prediction.

tools.name: ternary-diagram
tools.one_line_profile: Library for plotting ternary phase diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A specialized visualization tool for drawing ternary diagrams (phase diagrams) in materials science and chemistry, offering customization without heavy dependencies.

tools.name: Pynta
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for reaction path exploration on surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A python-based workflow tool designed to automate the exploration of reaction paths and transition states for molecules on metallic surfaces.

tools.name: Atomate
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-built high-throughput workflows for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library of computational workflows for the FireWorks workflow software, primarily used with pymatgen to automate VASP and other materials science calculations.

tools.name: aiida-castep
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for CASTEP DFT calculations
tools.detailed_description: A plugin connecting the AiiDA workflow engine with the CASTEP plane-wave density functional theory code, enabling automated calculations and provenance tracking.
